meanings.sent1: The company implemented strict antipiracy measures to protect their software.
meanings.sent2: The antipiracy campaign successfully reduced illegal copying of movies.
meanings.sent3: The antipiracy software was so effective that even the pirates were impressed.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to antipiracy efforts was a shining example to the entire team.
meanings.sent5: The bright red flag served as a symbol of their antipiracy stance.

meanings.definition: Measures taken to combat piracy, especially of digital content.
meanings.sent1: The government invested in advanced antipiracy technology for online protection.
meanings.sent2: The antipiracy laws were enforced rigorously to deter illegal downloads.
meanings.sent3: The team's mascot, a pirate-hunting parrot, added a fun touch to their antipiracy campaign.
meanings.sent4: The antipiracy task force worked tirelessly to secure the digital borders.
meanings.sent5: The new antipiracy strategy was like a shield guarding against online theft.
